article_title: Couples enjoy dinner and dance lessons at downtown cafe
article_text:
Bill Gatton Automotive

Welcome to Bill Gatton Auto Group! Located in Bristol, Tennessee, Bill Gatton Auto Group is proud to be one of the premier auto groups in the area. From the moment you walk into one of our showrooms, you’ll know our commitment to Customer Service is second to none. We strive to make your experience with Bill Gatton Auto Group a good one – for the life of your vehicle. Whether you need to Purchase, Finance, or Service a New or Pre-Owned Acura, Mazda, Nissan, Cadillac, Chevrolet, Suzuki, Honda, you’ve come to the right place. Call one of our stores or contact us through the site for your No-Obligation Internet Price Quote from our Internet Department.

og.description: BRISTOL, Tenn.— A number of local residents cut a rug into the New Year on Saturday with Latin dance lessons at a downtown Bristol café.
